description: 1080p layout used for CTWC Vietnam Regional 2024. Query string options are the same as CTWC23 with curtain exceptions: curtain=0 shows CTWC Vietnam Regional curtain, curtain=1 shows Classic Tetris Vietnam curtain. Curtain options have logos set with max-width: 333px for maximum cheesiness. Border options can be set with box_border (vn, vswinter, vsspring). Seed hack has been replaced by subtext hack (inspired by the VALORANT Champions Tour HUD): the last bit of text covered by [ ] will be set as subtext.
